revised_title: Reginald Edward Stradling: A Life of Engineering, Education, and Research
tldr: Reginald Edward Stradling was a civil engineer and educator who made significant contributions to building research and the development of the Building Research Station. He also served in World War I and had interests in psychical research, socialism, and social work among young people. Stradling's life was marked by a strong sense of duty, intellectual curiosity, and a desire to improve the lives of others through his work.
